original_text:
Now the serpent was more crafty than any other beast of the field that the Lord God had made.
He said to the woman, “Did God actually say, ‘You shall not eat of any tree in the garden’?”
korean_text: 그런데 뱀은 여호와 하나님이 지으신 들짐승 중에 가장 간교하니라 뱀이 여자에게 물어 이르되 하나님이 참으로 너희에게 동산 모든 나무의 열매를 먹지 말라 하시더냐

sentences.original_text: Now the serpent was more crafty
than any other beast of the field
that the Lord God had made.
‘You shall not eat of any tree in the garden’?
sentences.korean_translation: ‘너희는 동산 모든 나무의 열매는 먹지 말라’ 하시느냐?
